author: jorton
msg: entries returned by apr_dir_read(); reported by Philip Martin.

author: rbb
msg: Fix a bug in apr_match_glob.  We need to strdup the filename, otherwise
each call to apr_dir_read will overwrite the previous name.

author: rbb
msg: Add apr_match_glob and two tests to make sure that it is working.  There
is a problem that is documented in the code that requires an
apr_filepath_basename.  That will be added soon.

author: jorton
msg: Workaround odd behaviour of AF_UNSPEC lookups with AI_PASSIVE set on
